title: Cooked chicken (undead)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Cooked chicken is food made by cooking a raw chicken (undead) on a range or fire, requiring 1 Cooking and yielding 30 Cooking experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Cooked undead chicken
Cooked chicken
Released15 February 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableYes
EquipableNo
StackableNo
NoteableYes
EdibleYes
OptionsEat
DestroyDrop
ExamineThis cooked chicken looks disgusting.
Values
Value4 coins
High alch2 coins
Low alch1 coin
Weight0.141 kg
Advanced data
Item ID4291

Cooked chicken is food made by cooking a raw chicken (undead) on a range or fire, requiring 1 Cooking and yielding 30 Cooking experience.

Despite cooked undead chicken's appearance, it is safe to eat and heals 1 Hitpoints.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When cooking raw chicken (undead), the player receives the message "The undead chicken is now cooked, but it may not be good to eat." However, it is perfectly safe to eat.

[[File:Cooked chicken (undead) detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Cooked chicken''' is [[food]] made by cooking a [[raw chicken (undead)]] on a [[range]] or [[fire]], requiring 1 [[Cooking]] and yielding 30 Cooking [[experience]].

Despite cooked undead chicken's appearance, it is safe to eat and heals 1 [[Hitpoints]].

==Creation==
{{Recipe

|skill1lvl = 1
|skill1exp = 30
|members = Yes
|ticks = 1
|ticksnote = Increases to 4 with the use of the Make-X functionality.
|facilities = Cooking range
|mat1 = Raw chicken (undead)
|mat1cost = No
|output1 = Cooked chicken (undead)
|output1cost = No
}}

===Cooking chance===
{{Skilling success chart|label=Undead chicken cooking chance
|label1=Fire or Range|low1=128|high1=512|req1=1|color1=gray|image1=Cooked chicken (undead).png
|label2=Lumbridge range|low2=138|high2=532|req2=1|color2=green|image2=Lumbridge Teleport.png
|label3=Hosidius +5%|low3=140|high3=524|req3=1|color3=red|image3=Cooked chicken (undead).png
|label4=Hosidius +10%|low4=153|high4=537|req4=84|color4=blue|image4=Cooked chicken (undead).png
}}

==Trivia==
* When cooking [[raw chicken (undead)]], the player receives the message ''"The undead chicken is now cooked, but it may not be good to eat."'' However, it is perfectly safe to eat.
